page.title: 11SCHOOLS (FISHTOFT)
page.content: There are two schools in our area. Our school - Fishtoft - has just under 100 pupils whilst Butterwick has over 200. Fishtoft is over 100 years old and ten years ago was to close down because or had less thanb 30 children. Now it has nearly 100 and has 4 classes. The kitchen closed five years ago. The school house has been occupied by previous heads until recently and this summer is going to be developed as an extention to the school. They are going to build a new classroom, a library, a storeroom, an office and a staffroom. They are also going to put a new heating system in the school. Before she died Mrs. Rimington told us that in the war they dropped anti-personnel bombs in the playground.
